byline.contributor: Ana Vanessa Herrero reported from Caracas, and Elisabeth Malkin from Mexico City. Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.
byline.original: By ANA VANESSA HERRERO and ELISABETH MALKIN

abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro meets with Pope Francis and agrees to allow Vatican envoy to mediate official meeting between his government and opposition coalition in effort to solve country's political crisis.
lead_paragraph: Government representatives and a leader of the opposition agreed to allow the Vatican to mediate in an effort to solve Venezuela’s political crisis.
snippet: Government representatives and a leader of the opposition agreed to allow the Vatican to mediate in an effort to solve Venezuela’s political crisis....

headline.main: Vatican to Act as Mediator Between Venezuela’s Dueling Sides
headline.print_headline: Vatican Envoy to Act as Mediator in Venezuela
